resources.string:
Click on the tiles to display the images.

Match two similar tiles to win the round.

Try to pass all three levels.

Select two tiles from the given list. Each time you match them correctly, they stay.

If you match them wrong, all tiles flip! 

 Try to pass all three levels.

You can return to the title screen using up or back from within the game screen, and this will also end your game.
I mastered the memory game through %1$d/%2$d level(s)
